name: Google I/O Extended 2017 Ado-Ekiti

venue.name: AB Emporium Hotel & Events Centre, Housing Road Adebayo
venue.address_1: AB Emporium Hotel & Events Centre, Housing Road Adebayo

description:
Google I/O is an annual developer festival. I/O Extended 2017 Ado-Ekiti is an event that brings students, tech enthusiasts, entrepreneurs and local developer communities together in Ado-Ekiti to experience the I/O keynotes and sessions with one another in real-time, discuss and network. We will also be offering codelabs and hackathons activities.

The event would last for 2 days where the first day would be for I/O keynotes and Codelabs sessions and intensive trainings for participants who want to learn how to develop Android Mobile Apps and the second day for hackathons, competitions, and demos. We would be inviting tech professionals on the second day to become judges to the competitions and whoever wins would be given an Android Mobile device as a prize.
how_to_find_us: Turn into the street opposite FirstBank, Adebayo

name: Google Developer Days Europe: Ado-Ekiti Extended
description:
Google Developer Days Europe: Extended events

On September 5-6, Google Developer Days Europe will take place in Kraków, featuring technical talks on Android, the Mobile Web, Firebase, Cloud, Machine Learning, and IoT.

You can join in by running a GDD Extended event in your Community, streaming the keynote and running local talks or codelabs. You can run your event during the event or at any date before December that works for you. Please, create your event at Meetup.com and then register it here, preferably by August 1st in order to make it appear on the map at developers.google.com/events/gdd-europe/extended.

name: Mobile Sites Certification Web Study Jam

venue.name: AB Emporium Hotel & Events Centre, Housing Road Adebayo
venue.address_1: AB Emporium Hotel & Events Centre, Housing Road Adebayo

description:
Today over 50% of web traffic goes to mobile yet unfortunately developers aren’t designing effectively for it. For example 53% of mobile visitors will leave if a page takes more than three seconds to load. The average page takes 19 seconds to load over 3G. Speed is just one part of creating better mobile experiences and best practice has gone a long way past responsive design alone. Are you up to date?

Want to get started on the Mobile Computing, but don't know where to begin?

Join us for our Mobile Sites Certification Web Study Jam Series.  You'll be taken through the fundamentals of Mobile Web development with Google tools. 

Join this meetup to get web development skills free of charge.

Bring a laptop (PC)! And Power Box

Timing:

Day 1: 10am - 5pm

Day 2: 10am - 5pm
how_to_find_us: Off First Bank, Adebayo, Ado Ekiti

name: Cloud Study Jam Series

venue.name: AB Emporium Hotel & Events Centre, Housing Road Adebayo
venue.address_1: AB Emporium Hotel & Events Centre, Housing Road Adebayo

description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin?
Join us for our Cloud Study Jam! Together we'll work through three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you additional badges.
Join this meetup to get official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge.
Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.

Agenda:
6:00pm: Three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs
7:30pm: Break
8:00pm: Intro to Docker or Scientific Data Processing lab
9:00pm: Event ends

name: Next '18 Extended Ado-Ekiti
description:
What's new at Google Cloud? A lot — from new enterprise capabilities, to new ways of building apps that link people and data, to harnessing the natural symbiosis of IoT, Big Data and AI to do more, know more, and achieve more.
Breakthrough building, higher learning, and faster everything.
See how more developers are rapidly innovating with Google Cloud. Hear from developer and startup leaders, and watch live demos.
Google Cloud leaders talked about how the cloud is transforming business, making artificial intelligence available to everyone, and improving the lives and circumstances of people around the world in ways never before possible.
how_to_find_us: Turn into the street opposite FirstBank, Adebayo

name: ARCore Event-in-a-Box Workshop
description:
ARCore is Google’s platform for building augmented reality experiences. Using different APIs, ARCore enables your phone to sense its environment, understand the world and interact with information. Some of the APIs are available across Android and iOS to enable shared AR experiences.

Also note you are to come along with your PC in other to achieve effective practical.

name: DevFest Lagos
description:
Join the Google Developers Groups in Lagos for DevFest Lagos, the biggest developer conference ever held in this region. This event will take place on Saturday November 3, 2018 and will feature over 24 different sessions planned across multiple parallel tracks on Android, Web, Cloud, Machine Learning and with still more to come.

To attend this event, you must register - visit bit.ly/devfestlagos18 to register while we still have seats! Registration is free.

name: Flutter Study Jams
description: Flutter Study Jams are Community-run study groups based on the Flutter Udacity Course. Participants learn how to use Flutter to develop high-quality, interactive mobile applications for iOS and Android devices.

name: Cloud Study Jams 2019 - Kubernetes Solutions
description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!

Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Cloud Console, Kubernetes, Security, IoT on Cloud, and Machine Learning.

Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete any labs you want

Come along with your laptop and charger.
